page.title: 04LONGSTONE PRE-SCHOOL GROUP
page.content: In l984 parents of children of pre-school age came together to form the {Great Longstone Area Under Fives {Group}which aims, through play and constructive activity, to help the development of young children both physically and emotionally and to prepare them for entry into school. It is run by volunteers and because parents are actively involved, the Group also provides a means of social contact in the community. In order to be able to offer the children a more stimulating environment, the Group is currently engaged on a project to renovate the old infant's building at the School as a meeting place specially designed for the use of pre-school children to replace the present temporary accommodation.This will cost Â£4000 and has involved much fund raising.
